column4: News;Phnom Penh: A woman covered in blood was found outside the Council of Ministers at 8:50 pm on January 22
column10: had suffered injuries to her body.------A witness to the incident said they saw the woman thrown off the back of a motorbike by a man
column11: who also had blood on his body.------The man then rode off leaving the woman  bleeding
column12: crying and shouting in the street that her husband had hurt her.------When police arrived and questioned her
column13: she refused to answer and tried to chase them away.------When an ambulance arrived
column15: so police forced her into the ambulance for treatment at Preah Kossomak Hospital.------It was suspected that that the woman had taken drugs so was later taken to Department of Social Affairs and Rehabilitation for Adolescent Education. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/773452.html
